talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Accept)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fish Seller Mona$
I don't know who this thief is, but I will beat the person… into a pulp!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Case Log 2. The Culprit's Trail$</html>

$Fish Seller Mona$
Did you find the suspect?

$Waiter Mia$
Welcomeeow!
Please order at least one drink per person. Meow.

$Madam Rosa$
Well, what brought a busy champion like you here?
Did you miss me, honey?

$Fruit Seller Linda$
Sweet and juicy fruits!
(Linda looks disappointed.)I wonder why I have so little customers today.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Observe Mona's shop and its surrounding areas.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
An investigation should start by inspecting the scene of crime.
Now, if we look in the direction of Mona's shop…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Think carefully.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
I was watching Mona's shop until I met Grele here...
So the thief must be someone who was in this area and is swift.
With unnoticeable looks…
Argh… Who is this thief…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Turn around and peer at someone in the bar.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
Maybe there was a blind spot?
No, no, no. I'm sure it happened while I was talking with Grele.
Which means… It must be someone in Merca's Port who is swift enough for that!
Could it be…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Find the suspects and question them.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
Yes, that's right! That kid can see whether I'm watching Mona's shop or not.
Then the kid would have escaped my eyes, got to the opposite side and reached the fish!

$Fish Seller Mona$
Did you find out who's the suspect?

$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
You have found a suspect.
Go and question the suspect.

$Madam Rosa$
Well, what's brought a busy champion like you here?
Did you miss me? Huh?

$Fruit Seller Linda$
Sweet, sweet fruits!
(Disappointed)I wonder why there's so few people today.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, no. I've come to meet you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
Welcomeow.
You're lucky, since we've got only one table left. Meow.
Have a sit and I'll bring you the menu.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Show him the document requesting assistance in criminal investigation.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
I'm working at this meowment.
If you have any business with me, wait until my work is done. Meow.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Have you left your workplace during your working hours today?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
Wh-what is this? Hm… A request of assistance for a criminal investigation?
Meow-- If you have any questions, ask meow.
But you must not disrupt my work. Meow!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Private space? And where's that space?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
I have my breaks.
During break time, I rest in my private space. Meow.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Something feels suspicious!)</FONT> Are you not going to assist in this investigation or what?!!!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
(Startled)It won't be private anymore if I tell you that!
I won't tell yeow. It's a secret. Meow.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You just need to prove your alibi. Tell me now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
Grrr. Grrr. Why are you doing this?
Are you suspecting me-meow?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If you keep your mouth shut, you'll become the suspect.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
I can't tell you, since it's a private space. Meow.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Will you keep being stubborn?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
Ugh. Ugh. (Mia grunts and suddenly loses his temper.)
Hiss! I've done nothing wrong. Meow!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Madam Rosa?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
Hey, darling.
How about leaving my poor Mia alone and play with me instead?
I can prove Mia's alibi if that's what you want.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Although Mia looks suspicious…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Waiter Mia$
Did you hear that, meow? I'm inneowcent!
I'm just a hardworking cat! Meow...

$Waiter Mia$
I'm an innocent cat. Meow.

$Fish Seller Mona$
Did you find the suspect?

$A Place With a Good View of the Fish Shop$
…

$Fruit Seller Linda$
Sweet, sweet fruits!
(Disappointed)I wonder why there's so few people today.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He wouldn't tell me where he rests. That makes me suspicious.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
Did my Mia do something wrong?
Questioning him with such a scary face is just… You’re being too harsh, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Eh? What do you mean by "butler"?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
Huh? Then you've failed as a butler, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Does that mean you know Mia's secret hiding place?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
I'm not telling you.
Forget about butlers, and remember that Mia is a cat. Cats won't tell anyone about their secret hiding places.
Though it's easy to figure out where they are……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then why would you call them "secret hiding places" at all? And why won't he tell me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
But anyone would know!
He’s always curled up in between the boxes stacked next to the shop wall.
It is so cute to watch him run to that spot during breaks… I'm sure you'll fall in love with him too if you see that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m not interested in falling in love with cats. I’m still suspicious of him.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
You can't be loved by a cat if you say something like that.
I see, you won't be a good butler. Ha ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's an <FONT color=#a82424>investigation</FONT>! AN INVESTIGATION.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
There’s nothing to be suspicious about. Cats are always like that.
It's hard to understand them, but they are still lovable. Like my Mia.
But why do you need Mia's alibi?
In most cases, people ask for my schedule… You've got some unusual taste.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Sigh... Don't make fun of me. I need to start the investigation from zero again.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
How cute that you’re so easily agitated by such jokes.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Let's change the course of investigation and think again.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Madam Rosa$
Your situation is regrettable, but don't suspect my Mia again.
Do you understand? (*Wink*♡)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
Someone who can walk around Merca's Port freely, who can move swiftly enough to steal fish within the brief moment I was talking with Grele, who's near the fish shop...
Argh…
(A seagull in the sky suddenly catches your attention.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Could it be seagulls?!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fruit Seller Linda$
Shoo- Shoo-
I can't stand these seagulls!!! Go away!

$Waiter Mia$
I'm an innocent cat. Meow.

$Fish Seller Mona$
Did you find the suspect?

$Spot from where you can see the fish shop$
…

$Madam Rosa$
Now stay away from my Mia, understand?
If you bully him again, I will #@!! and !^*#@ you. DO NOT FORGET IT!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, thank you. I just wanted to ask you some questions about that seagull.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fruit Seller Linda$
Welcome. You’ll have the honour of being my first customer today if you buy something from my store!
I’ll give you these apples for free.
Which fruit do you want to buy?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You just shooed a seagull away. Did it cause you any trouble?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fruit Seller Linda$
Oh… (She sighs after finding out that you're not a customer.)
That seagull just flies around this place. I don't sell seagulls.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(It must be that seagull!)</FONT> Does the seagull eat fruits?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fruit Seller Linda$
Oh. That's Captain Hector's new pet bird.
It’s name was Alex or something. I don't remember it exactly.
Anyway, the bird keeps coming to my shop and harms my fruits.
I even caught it pecking at my apples a few times.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I knew it!)</FONT> Thank you, Linda. I think I found the <FONT color=#a82424>thief</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fruit Seller Linda$
I don't know about other shops, but the seagull keeps coming back about twice a day and snatches my fruits.
Whenever I leave the shop empty, some of my fruits always go missing.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's solved now! Don't worry.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fruit Seller Linda$
What? A thief?
Did something happen?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Fruit Seller Linda$
So what is it that you've solved…?
Wait a minute, I haven't sold anything yet for today. Sigh...

journal.title: Proof Secured
journal.contents:
Investigate the crime scene carefully.

Merca's Port - ??

journal.title: The Suspect
journal.contents:
Find Waiter Mia and question him.

Merca's Port - Waiter Mia
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Waiter Mia at Merca's Port.

journal.title: Rosa's Testimony
journal.contents:
Talk to Madam Rosa about Waiter Mia's alibi.

Merca's Port - Madam Rosa
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Madam Rosa at Merca's Port.

journal.title: A New Suspect
journal.contents:
Talk with Fruit Seller Linda about the suspicious seagull and secure the proof.

Merca's Port - Fruit Seller Linda
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Fruit Seller Linda at Merca's Port.
